section.37: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Sa, id b. Musayyib reported that Mu'awiya said one day:Should I narrate to you the evil make-up. Allah's Apostle (ï·º) forbade cheating. It was during that time that a person came with a staff and there was a cloth on its head, whereupon Mu, awiya said: Behold, that is cheating. Qatada said: This implies how women artificially increase their hair with the help of rags
